Name: Island Build Masters
About the game: City building simulators strike back! In this game you are an architect whose mission is to restore the city, destroyed by the invaders. You have allied forces and weapons to destroy enemies. You are waiting for more than a million options for the construction of the city, complete freedom of action, a pleasant calm atmosphere and a world rating of players in which you have a chance to become the Number One! Make enemies regret the invasion and rebuild the city in the new Indie game Island Build Masters!
